name: WesternEquineEncephalitisVirusDiseaseTestsForWesternEquineEncephalitisVirusAntibodyQualitative
title: Western Equine Encephalitis Virus Disease (Tests for Western Equine Encephalitis Virus Antibody [Qualitative])
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Western Equine Encephalitis antibody (qualitative results).),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Western Equine Encephalitis),(Exclusion Criteria: - Panel tests, interpretation tests
- All other Arboviral conditions)
